name: micle-berry
effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item, and its next used move has 1.2× its normal accuracy.
short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/4 max HP to boost accuracy of next move by 20%. (Gen IV: Perfect accuracy)
